description: Describes the revocation files in use by the specified trust store or revocation files.

parameters.name: TrustStoreArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.

parameters.name: RevocationIds
parameters.description: The revocation IDs of the revocation files you want to describe. (integer) ---

nested_items.name: TrustStoreRevocations
nested_items.description: Information about the revocation file in the trust store.

nested_items.name: TrustStoreArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.

nested_items.name: RevocationId
nested_items.description: The revocation ID of a revocation file in use.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the marker for the next set of results. Otherwise, this is null.
